metadata.synopsis: Arabella and Withers interact in camp. You can tell Arabella her parents are dead, leading to Withers calming her down. You learn her power and she will get sent off to Sorcerous SUndires after the end of Act 2
metadata.how_to_trigger: addTag ACT2_SHADOW_CURSE_IMMUNE:b47643e0-583c-4808-b108-f6d3b605b0a9 (ReCon command)oe CAMP_JergalToCampgoto -149; 16talk to Arabella and send her to campgoto -182; 17speak to corpse tender and discover corpse is Arballe'a parentclick on both the corpsesGo to camp and click on Arabella or Jergal.

33.speaker: Arabella
33.text: Hey - you never said you were friends with a skellie!

1.speaker: Withers
1.text: I am not a 'skellie'. Thou shalt call me Withers.

25.speaker: Arabella
25.text: 'Withers'? I'm not going to remember that! I'm calling you 'Bone Man'.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: I'm glad to see you're getting along.
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to player. She's mocking Withers here.

56.speaker: Arabella
56.text: He's funny - like my grandpa when he didn't get his nap.
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to player. She's mocking Withers here.

32.speaker: Arabella
32.text: Hey Bone Man, can you make your teeth chatter?

40.speaker: Withers
40.text: I can, but I will not.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: Bad news, Arabella. Your parents are dead.

64.speaker: Withers
64.text: Soon enough. But first, thou must tend to the girl. It is time she learns the truth.

14.speaker: Withers
14.text: Thou shan't leave. The girl must know the truth.

22.speaker: Arabella
22.text: The truth? Wait. What do you mean?

36.speaker: Withers
36.text: Speak, and let it be done.

39.speaker: Narrator
39.text: *A single image haunts your mind - a tiefling corpse, carelessly mauled in the so-called House of Healing.*
39.context: InternalNodeContext: Needs to remain so the player is sure to connect  the corpse with this moment.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: Tell her yourself, if it means that much.

18.speaker: Withers
18.text: Thou mayest deny truth. I do not.

4.speaker: Withers
4.text: Thy parents have left for the Fugue Plane. They are, in a word, dead.

15.speaker: Arabella
15.context: CinematicNodeContext:  Arabella in disbelief shoots glances between the player and Withers expectantlyNodeContext: In disbelief and anger, hearing her parents  have died.

11.speaker: Arabella
11.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Black flames surround Arabella as her anger grows. (Visualisation can be changed if needed, see Kevin V.)

Arabella's anger grows as black flames surround her, a magical manifestation of her hurt and rage.NodeContext: Arabella's anger grows and black flames surround her as she yells, a magical manifestation of her hurt and rage.

50.text: Listen. Dost thou not hear it? Where creation meets ruin, where morning meets midnight - the root of all being.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: The flames surrounding Arabella intensify.

12.text: Listen. Dost thou not hear it? Where creation meets ruin, where morning meets midnight - the root of all being.
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: The flames surrounding Arabella intensify.

47.text: Listen. Dost thou not hear it? Where creation meets ruin, where morning meets midnight - the root of all being.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Calmly, even as Arabella's magic rages. Addressed to Arabella.NodeContext: Calmly, even as Arabella's magic rages. Addressed to Arabella.

26.speaker: Withers
26.text: Listen. Dost thou not hear it? Where creation meets ruin, where morning meets midnight - the root of all being.
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Calmly, even as Arabella's magic rages. Addressed to Arabella.NodeContext: Calmly, even as Arabella's magic rages. Addressed to Arabella.

21.speaker: Withers
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to Arabella.NodeContext: Addressed to Arabella.

73.speaker: Arabella
73.context: NodeContext: Still disturbed by learning of her parents, but calming

43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Arabella breathes and begins to calm.

27.speaker: Arabella
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Calm now. Addressed to Withers, though more or less said to herself.NodeContext: Calm now. Addressed to Withers, though more or less said to hersel.

38.text: *Your very soul is tangled in shadow. Arabella's magic, wild as cursed briar. Her talent is now yours, too.*
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: The black flames fade from Arabella and envelop the player.

37.text: *Your very soul is tangled in shadow. Arabella's magic, wild as cursed briar. Her talent is now yours, too.*
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player is now surrounded by black flames

58.speaker: Narrator
58.text: *Your very soul is tangled in shadow. Arabella's magic, wild as cursed briar. Her talent is now yours, too.*
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player is now surrounded by black flames

7.speaker: Withers
7.text: The girl must learn the ways of the arcane - but she shan't remain here.
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: Who could teach the girl? Her magic is even wilder than mine.
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

24.speaker: Withers
24.text: She will tame it in time. The Weave would not see one like her abandoned.

34.speaker: Player
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

20.speaker: Withers
20.text: The Weave knows her purpose. It will guide her plainly, if she listens.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

17.speaker: Withers
17.text: Arabella holds a power beyond reckoning. That of the decaying forest, and the seedling that bore it.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

3.speaker: Withers
3.text: But it is unbalanced. Her yoke is already heavy; if she walks thy path, it will surely break.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

2.speaker: Withers
2.text: Arabella will depart, once thou dost leave these accursed lands. She will find her way safely; thus it is fated.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

13.speaker: Arabella
13.text: Bone Man, you're making me leave?
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

54.speaker: Withers
54.text: Fear not, girl. The Weave knows thy purpose. It will guide thee, if thou dost listen.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

41.speaker: Withers
41.text: Fear not, girl. Abandon not the Weave, and it shall not abandon thee.
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: You can trust Withers. If he says you'll be safe, you should believe him.
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: I'm sorry. I wish it could be different.
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I'm not going to make you go away.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

5.speaker: Withers
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

31.speaker: Arabella
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

44.speaker: Narrator
44.text: *You feel her grief fade as if it were your own - there is a lightness in her now, veiling the power within, soothing it.*
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers does a magical motion with his hands. Arabella instantly becomes calm, focused. Withers continues to cast the magic - the black flame turns to white and becomes a warm glow that envelops Arabella and the player.

69.text: Is that my future? Is that why they died?
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Arabella peers at Withers' magic in wonder. NodeContext: Arabella peers at Withers' magic in wonder.

60.speaker: Arabella
60.text: Is that my future? Is that why they died?
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Arabella peers at Withers' magic in wonder. NodeContext: Arabella peers at Withers' magic in wonder.

67.speaker: Withers
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Warm glow fades. NodeContext: Warm glow fades. Arabella wipes a tear from her cheek as she looks at the player

16.speaker: Arabella
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Warm glow fades. NodeContext: Warm glow fades. Arabella wipes a tear from her cheek as she looks at the player

42.speaker: Arabella
42.text: Thank you, Bone Man. For being... nice.
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Warm glow fades. NodeContext: Warm glow fades. Arabella wipes a tear from her cheek as she looks at the player

10.speaker: Arabella
10.text: If there are people like you around, perhaps everything will be all right.
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Warm glow fades. NodeContext: Warm glow fades. Arabella wipes a tear from her cheek as she looks at the player

49.speaker: Player
49.text: Why not? I'm not sending her out there alone.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: Fine with me. She's already outstayed her welcome.

72.speaker: Withers
72.text: I speak not with malice, but with prudence.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: I will teach her. I will help her channel the Weave.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: No. It isn't the right time.

28.speaker: Withers
28.text: She is ready. I have deemed it so.

35.speaker: Arabella
35.text: I don't believe it. They can't be...
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Arabella is speaking with Withers. She is distraught about her parents' death and beginning to lose control.

29.speaker: Withers
29.text: Breathe, child. Resist not the winds of change. Let them carry thee.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers is speaking calmly to the child Arabella, to keep her from blowing up over finding out her parents are dead.
